question: Hit Refresh is the first book of __________.
explanation: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella has launched his first book named Hit Refresh. The book includes the inside story of the company's continuing transformation, Nadella's own personal journey, Vision for the coming wave of intelligent technologies. Satya Nadella will donate all proceeds from Hit Refresh to Microsoft Philanthropies. It includes a set of questions for anybody searching for improvement for themselves as leaders, for their institutions and for society.
